rules_text:
Reach
[i]Lightning[/i] [i]Physic[/i] – When Moulder, Wise Counselor enters, you may exile target creature. If you do, each player gains life equal to that creatures power.
[i]Divine[/i] – Whenever Moulder attacks, tap up to one target creature with lesser toughness.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Moulder deals combat damage to a player, you gain 2 life.
